BehaviourSettings.scChangeHint: [shift+L-click to add all, shift+R-click to remove all]

autoSkipConfirmDialogue.name: Skip confirm dialogue
autoSkipConfirmDialogue.hint: If the confirm dialogue is skipped, if only one target level is available

continueMovement.name: Continue movement
continueMovement.hint: If token movement should resume after the level change (respects wall collision of new level)

targetLevelChoice.name: Target level
targetLevelChoice.hint: The level which this behaviour can send tokens to (not limited by the regions levels)

chosenLevels.name: Chosen levels
chosenLevels.hint: Levels chosen for the Target level setting. If none are chosen, all levels are available.

movementTypeExclusion.name: Excluded movement
movementTypeExclusion.hint: Tokens that enter the region with this movement type will not trigger this behaviour

combatantDocuments.name: Combatants
combatantDocuments.hint: Tokens to be added as combatants

playerTokensTriggeronly.name: Characters trigger
playerTokensTriggeronly.hint: If only tokens set as a player character should trigger this region

addTokensonRegion.name: Tokens on Region
addTokensonRegion.hint: If the Tokens curently standing on this region should be added

addPlayerTokens.name: Player Characters
addPlayerTokens.hint: If tokens set as a player character should be added

once.name: Once
once.hint: Disable the behaviour after the first time it's triggered

movementTypeEnter.name: Enter Movement
movementTypeEnter.hint: The movement type tokens entering the behaviours region are set to

movementTypeLeave.name: Leave Movement
movementTypeLeave.hint: The movement type tokens leaving the behaviours region are set to

visibilityDocuments.name: Placeables
visibilityDocuments.hint: Placeables (Tokens, Tiles, Doors) whose visibility is changed

logicMode.name: Logic
logicMode.hint: The way the following values are combined

conditionTypes.name: Condition types
conditionTypes.hint: Activate and deactivate types of conditions

ignoreDisabled.name: Ignore disabled
ignoreDisabled.hint: If the disabled state of the triggered behaviours should be ignored [In most cases you will want this set to true and the target behaviours set to disabled]

conditionalItemsinToken.name: Items
conditionalItemsinToken.hint: Entering token is checked for these Items

checkIteminTokenZero.name: Check Quntity
checkIteminTokenZero.hint: If the above items should be checked for a quantity higher than 0

conditionalMacros.name: Macros
conditionalMacros.hint: Macros should return 'true', 'false', 'undefined' (skip) or an array thereof [Parameters: speaker, actor, token, scene, region, behavior, event]

conditionalScript.name: Script
conditionalScript.hint: The script should return 'true', 'false', 'undefined' (skip) or an array thereof [Parameters: actor, token, scene, region, behavior, event]

changeItemDocuments.name: Items
changeItemDocuments.hint: Items to be chnaged in the tokens inventory

changeItemMode.name: Mode
changeItemMode.hint: The way the above defined items quantity is changed

itemQuantity.name: Quantity
itemQuantity.hint: Quantity for the above defined mode

deleteItemonZero.name: Delete on zero
deleteItemonZero.hint: If the changed items should be deletet if the quantity reaches 0

pingPosition.name: Ping Position
pingPosition.hint: Coordinates of the point to ping [x,y]

pingDuration.name: Ping Duration
pingDuration.hint: Duration of the ping in seconds

pingTokensonRegion.name: Ping Tokens on Region
pingTokensonRegion.hint: If tokens currently standing on this region should also be pinged

movementTypeBlocked.name: Prevented Movement
movementTypeBlocked.hint: Movement types to prevent in this region (a GM can still move tokens using unconstrained movement)

rollTables.name: Roll Tables
rollTables.hint: Roll tables rolled by the user when triggered

active.name: Adjust Teleport Token behaviour
active.hint: If the teleport token behaviour should be modified (custom teleport target without region)

active.name: Adjust Change Level behaviour
active.hint: If the change level behaviour should be modified (skip dialog, continue movement, custom level choice, exclude movement type)

autoSkipConfirmDialogue_default.name: Skip Change Level dialog by default
autoSkipConfirmDialogue_default.hint: If the change level dialog confirmation should be skipped by default if only one valid target level is available

continueMovement_default.name: Change Level continue Movement by default
continueMovement_default.hint: If the movement should continue after changing levels by default
